title: IDraftFeatureData2.IGetPartingLines
description: Gets the parting lines that define this draft feature.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of parting lines of size Count VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IDraftFeatureData2::GetPartingLinesCount
to determine the size of the returned array.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
